title: Can't have fun anymore
body:
You can't even have fun with people who are premade and choose cheese team comps like this
{{champion:32}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:54}} &{{champion:22}} . It limits the champion pool so much and many champs just fall out of meta because its not viable because they don't have a crap ton of cc. But maybe i'm just butthurt.

replies.body: Against that team, just build some MR and burst the Ashe.  GG

> [{quoted}](name=Bagguette,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JanKim1s,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-10T00:15:15.778+0000)
>
> You can&#039;t even have fun with people who are premade and choose cheese team comps like this
> {{champion:32}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:54}} &amp;{{champion:22}} . It limits the champion pool so much and many champs just fall out of meta because its not viable because they don&#039;t have a crap ton of cc. But maybe i&#039;m just butthurt.

you can have fun but they are just going to have even more fun with friends

maybe up your strategy a bit so you can deal with that.
